g++     -std=c++14 -Wall -Wextra -Winline -Ofast -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/mtPong.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mtPong.dir/src/player.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mtPong.dir/src/shape.cpp.o CMakeFiles/mtPong.dir/src/ball.cpp.o  -o mtPong -rdynamic -lpthread -lX11 -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -lsfml-audio
